announcements.message: We're excited to introduce our new in-app notification system! You'll now receive updates about new features, important changes, and helpful tips directly in the app. Check back here regularly to stay informed about what's new with Owl.md.

announcements.title: New Feature: Enhanced Dark Mode Support
announcements.message: We've completely redesigned the dark mode experience! The new dark theme offers better contrast, reduced eye strain, and a more cohesive color palette across all screens. Try it out by tapping the theme toggle in the top bar.

announcements.title: Update: Performance Improvements
announcements.message: This update includes significant performance optimizations for large markdown documents. You should notice faster rendering in preview mode and smoother scrolling when editing. PDF generation is also 30% faster on average!

announcements.title: New Feature: More Callout Types

announcements.title: Feature: Load Markdown from GitHub URLs
announcements.message: You can now load markdown files directly from GitHub! Just paste a GitHub URL and we'll fetch the content for you. Perfect for collaborative editing and sharing documents from your repositories.

announcements.title: Update: New PDF Theme - Modern
announcements.message: Check out our brand new 'Modern' PDF theme! It features a clean, contemporary design with optimized typography and spacing. Great for professional documents and presentations. Access it from the PDF theme selector.

announcements.title: Update: Landscape Mode Optimizations
announcements.message: We've optimized the app for landscape orientation on mobile devices! The quick actions menu, more menu, and editor panels now adapt intelligently to landscape mode, providing a better experience when using your device horizontally.

announcements.title: Important: Remember to Back Up Your Work
announcements.message: While Owl.md saves your documents locally, we recommend regularly backing up important files to cloud storage or external drives. Use the 'Save As' feature to export your markdown files and keep them safe!

announcements.title: Feature: File History & Quick Access
announcements.message: Your recently opened files are now saved in the file history! Access them quickly from the history drawer (swipe from left edge or tap the menu). Never lose track of your work again.

announcements.title: Tip: Keyboard Shortcuts for Formatting
announcements.message: Did you know? Long-press any formatting button in the toolbar to see keyboard shortcuts! Make your markdown editing faster with shortcuts for bold, italic, headings, lists, and more.

announcements.title: Feature: Direct PDF Sharing
announcements.message: You can now share your generated PDFs directly from the app! After converting to PDF, use the share button to send your document via email, messaging apps, or save to cloud storage.

announcements.title: Update: Improved Code Block Rendering
announcements.message: Code blocks in PDFs now look even better! We've improved syntax highlighting support and fixed formatting issues with long lines. Your code snippets will now render perfectly in all PDF themes.

announcements.title: Update: New Notification Center Implementation
announcements.message: New Notification System Implementation. App now receives notifications from main channel regard updates and announcements
